text: I guess if you take yourself seriously as an artist there starts either the problem or the beauty of doing good artwork.
author: Bill Griffith

text: I just wanted to see every single musical I could. The very first one I saw was 'Beauty and the Beast,' the only one I could get tickets for, and then 'Les Miserables' and then 'Chicago.'
author: America Ferrera

text: My duty is to try to reach beauty. Cinema is emotion. When you laugh you cry.
author: Roberto Benigni

text: The expression of beauty is in direct ratio to the power of conception the artist has acquired.
author: Gustave Courbet

text: It is curious how, from time immemorial, man seems to have associated the idea of evil with beauty, shrunk from it with a sort of ghostly fear, while, at the same time drawn to it by force of its hypnotic attraction.
author: Richard Le Gallienne
